text.text:
The mall is simple with a handful of clothing stores, a cinema, a food court, restaurants,  and the Public Bishan Library is right around the corner of the mall. You can also walk outside on the 1st floor and walk through to the bus station, and then library and other smaller stores and another outdoor food court.

Location is decent as there‚Äôs a handful of stores in and out of the mall, near big and smaller bus stations, the Bishan MRT, and more. Not the best mall I‚Äôd say in all of Singapore but it‚Äôs still very nice and comfortable.

You can also walk outside on the 1st floor and walk through to the bus station, and then library and other smaller stores and another outdoor food court.

Location is decent as there‚Äôs a handful of stores in and out of the mall, near big and smaller bus stations, the Bishan MRT, and more. Not the best mall I‚Äôd say in all of Singapore but it‚Äôs still very nice and comfortable.

text.text: Junction 8 above Bishan MRT Station, has changed and improved beyond recognition.  I have not been to this area of Singapore for over 10 years.  There are two MRT Lines using Bishan as interchange station, plus the BIshan Bus interchange.  This makes Junction 8 a convenient shopping mall for those who live in nearby estates, and others who just change mode of transport here.

originalText.text: Junction 8 above Bishan MRT Station, has changed and improved beyond recognition.  I have not been to this area of Singapore for over 10 years.  There are two MRT Lines using Bishan as interchange station, plus the BIshan Bus interchange.  This makes Junction 8 a convenient shopping mall for those who live in nearby estates, and others who just change mode of transport here.

text.text:
A mall just outside Bishan MRT, has been around for a long time and went through expansion. It's an older mall, but has been revamped.

There are good variety of shops, but the mall is not the kind that you get attached to or become as destination. It has nothing special, doesn't feel and look special. It's functional and convenient because it's close to the MRT, and you probably can find things you need here. I know it's an odd thing to say, but in Singapore, mall is kind of a necessity, as it's not common to find mom-and-pop store anymore, and sometimes ordinary market is not conveniently located.

text.text:
üüß Junction 8
9 Bishan Place, Singapore 579837

üü© Junction 8 is a popular heartland HDB shopping mall located in the centre of Bishan.  ‚óè It's a 1 minute walk from Bishan MRT station and Bishan Bus Interchange.

üü¶ It has 4 retail floors,
üü´ 2 parking floors (B1 and B2),
üüß 7 office floors ( L5 to L11 )

üü® It's a medium-sized mall that is packed with many retail shops like cafes, restaurants, beauty salons, gift stores, clothing stores, boutique shops, shoe shops, money changer shops, a supermarket, a cinema and many other shops.

It's a relatively easy-to-navigate mall in terms of layout.

text.text:
I visited Oriental Hair Solutions for a scalp treatment offered at only $19.00 .. I was skeptical at first as I‚Äôve been scammed a huge amount at a different Salon & almost backed out but my scalp was itching daily & I had to get it sorted out. .. was treated by a client bsultant Ms Serene who went about treating my scalp in a professional manner ‚Ä¶ it turned out ( according to her ) that it was only a case of dandruff ‚Ä¶ anyway at the end of the treatment I expected her to hard sell into taking up a package but she did not ‚Ä¶ made my day ‚Ä¶ by now I was starving & was spoiled for choice at the options ‚Ä¶ ended up having a a Chocolate eclair. TWO potato curry puffs,a nutty coffee roll all from POLAR, an Unagi bento ( mediocre but ‚Äò‚Äòtwas on sale )   ,a fishball noodle  meal & coffee‚Ä¶

Eyed a Bluetooth speaker from Anker but couldn‚Äôt get it due to budget constraints‚Ä¶ Also noted lots of items for my daily meals at NTUC ‚Ä¶ important for me as I live alone & cook quite often ‚Ä¶ there were many other stores such as leather repair etc & I‚Äôll be back again ‚Ä¶ ‚ù§Ô∏è
